WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
 
Don't know if this project is still under active development, but since C#/VS has introduced new language Keywords (async/ await) it would be great if you would rename your variables in Methoddefinitions like
 
PolylineEditor.cs
   private void AddLineToPlotter(bool async){
   
   }
 
Otherwise this Project can't compile when the Async CTP is installed.
More infos to the Async CTP: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/vstudio/gg316360
 
Cheers
